definition: holding device consisting of one or both of the opposing parts of a tool that close to hold an object, censure severely or angrily
details:
noun
- holding device consisting of one or both of the opposing parts of a tool that close to hold an object
- the part of the skull of a vertebrate that frames the mouth and holds the teeth
- the bones of the skull that frame the mouth and serve to open it
verb
- censure severely or angrily
= synonyms: rag
- talk incessantly and tiresomely
= synonyms: yack, yack away, rattle on, yap away
- talk socially without exchanging too much information
= synonyms: visit
- chew (food)
= synonyms: chew
